title: having serious issues with the game
body:
sometimes the game seems to stop responding and then everything starts happening in my screen 3-4 seconds after they actually happened
it gets eventually worse to the point where the game wont even connect, all of this while i have a decent ping
i tried restarting the client and my internet
internet is fine, but i cant log in now

can you guys help me on this?
thanks in advance

edit: just logged in, but still, i need help. i had to leave a ranked game because of this
edit 2: i cant view my profile or else ill get spammed with error messages, but the match history loaded and the game appears as a "leave"
edit 3: my profile loaded partially. im also noticing that other people are having similar issues. the game still appears as a "leave". any info from riot?

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some input delay, which can be caused by network problems.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your situation.  The results will also provide a list of troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  If you're still having issues, you can also check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!
